metadata.title: CVE-2024-3567 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in QEMU. An assertion failure was present in theupdate_sctp_checksum() function in hw/net/net_tx_pkt.c when trying tocalculate the checksum of a short-sized fragmented packet. This flaw allowsa malicious guest to crash QEMU and cause a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: qemu package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
